lead_paragraph: Calvin (Paul Dano) is a young novelist who achieved phenomal success early in his career but is now struggling with his writing - as well as his romantic life. Finally, he makes a breakthrough and creates a character named Ruby who inspires him. Whe
snippet: Calvin (Paul Dano) is a young novelist who achieved phenomal success early in his career but is now struggling with his writing - as well as his romantic life. Finally, he makes a breakthrough and creates a character named Ruby who inspires him. Whe
